short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin is used to set alerts on Kite zerodha. It is very handy and alerts you through telegram once secretid is provided by us.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The item is used to set alerts on stocks while trading on zerodha in real time over telegram. It takes no more than a second to set alert and alerts will be notified via telegram
